messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I would like to know how many t-shirt options are currently available in your online store. Also, I have some pending t-shirt orders that I want to modify. I want to change all of them to purple color, size small, with the same v-neck style, and I prefer polyester material. Could you assist me with that?
